description: This is a description of the app.

servicesList.title: professionalCleaning
servicesList.description: Our professional cleaning service ensures your home or office is spotless and hygienic. Our trained staff use top-quality cleaning products and equipment to provide a thorough clean, tailored to your specific needs.

servicesList.title: salon
servicesList.description: Our salon services offer a range of beauty and grooming treatments including haircuts, styling, coloring, facials, and more. Our experienced stylists use high-quality products to ensure you look and feel your best.

servicesList.title: washingMachineRepair
servicesList.description: Get your washing machine running smoothly again with our repair service. Our skilled technicians can diagnose and fix a variety of issues quickly and efficiently, so you can get back to your routine.

servicesList.title: geyserRepair
servicesList.description: Our geyser repair service ensures you have a reliable hot water supply. We handle all types of geyser issues, from heating problems to leaks, providing a quick and effective solution.

servicesList.title: carpenters
servicesList.description: Our professional carpenters can handle all your woodworking needs, from furniture repair to custom-made pieces. We provide quality craftsmanship and reliable service for all types of carpentry projects.

servicesList.title: plumbers
servicesList.description: Our experienced plumbers are available to handle all your plumbing needs, from fixing leaks to installing new fixtures. We offer prompt and efficient service to ensure your plumbing system is in top condition.

servicesList.title: rORepair
servicesList.description: Ensure your water purifier is working perfectly with our RO repair service. Our technicians are skilled in repairing and maintaining all types of RO systems to provide you with clean and safe drinking water.

servicesList.title: fullHomeCleaning
servicesList.description: Our full home cleaning service provides a comprehensive clean for your entire home. We cover all areas, including kitchens, bathrooms, living spaces, and bedrooms, leaving your home sparkling clean and fresh.

servicesList.title: electricians
servicesList.description: Our professional electricians offer a wide range of electrical services, from repairs and installations to safety inspections. We ensure all work is done safely and up to code, providing you with peace of mind.

servicesList.title: refrigeratorRepair
servicesList.description: Our refrigerator repair service ensures your fridge is running efficiently. We handle all types of issues, including cooling problems, leaks, and more, with quick and reliable service to keep your food fresh.

loginToBook: To book the service, please login or sign up
reviewBookingDetails: Please review your booking and cart details before confirming.
loginToViewBooking: Please log in to view your booking details
endDateAfterStartDate: End date must be after the start date.
